 INSURANCE REGULATORY AND ae DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY OF INDIA ONE EARTH ONE FAMILY ONE FUTURE /184/10/2023 Ref No: IRDAI/GA&HR/CIR/MISC/184/10/2023 5 19.10.2023 / To, All Regulated Entities and Training Institutes :- " 2023 Sub: - Observing "National Cyber Security Awareness Month (NCSAM): October 2023 1. /189/ 09/2022 , 2022 Attention is invited to IRDAI Circular ref: IRDAI/GA&HR/CIR/MISC/189/09/2022 dated 06'" Sep, 2022 advising Regulated Entities for observing Cyber Jaagrookta Diwas (CJD)" on the first Wednesday of every month. 2. fay It is stated that the Month of October is globally observed as the National Cyber Security Awareness Month (NCSAM) with an aim of increasing cyber security awareness among the public and private sector to create awareness about the importance of cyber security which, in turn, will enhance cyber resilience of the country. 3. , 2023 , 2023 infosec@irdai.gov.in In this connection, you are advised to celebrate Month of October, 2023, as National Cyber Security Awareness Month (NCSAM) and carry out activities promoting cyber hygiene by conducting mass awareness program through multiple media like television, radio, reels, memes, SMS etc. and share the summary of activities carried out at infosec@irdai.gov.in by 3 Nov, 2023.
